title: Existential quantifier
text: Remember tha delta in a ε-δ defintion must be greater than the distance between the variable(x in this case) and what the variable is going to (a in this case).
speech: Remember tha delta in a ε-δ defintion must be greater than the distance between the variable(x in this case) and what the variable is going to (a in this case).
pacedSpeech: Remember tha delta in a ε-δ defintion must be greater than the distance between the variable(x in this case) and what the variable is going to (a in this case).

title: Distance
text: Since delta must be greater than the distance between $$x$$ and a, then delta must be positive
speech: Since delta must be greater than the distance between  x  and a, then delta must be positive

and a, then delta must be positive
